member.summary: Applies pagination to a query.
Returns paginated results using an expression predicate for filtering.
member.param: Optional filter expression. If null, returns all entities.
Optional sort expression. If null, sorts by ID.
member.returns: Paginated result with items and total count.

member.summary: Returns paginated results using a specification for filtering.
member.param: Optional specification for filtering. If null, returns all entities.
Optional sort expression. If null, sorts by ID.
member.returns: Paginated result with items and total count.

member.name: T:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.EfCoreSpecificationEvaluator`1
member.summary: EF Core implementation of ISpecificationEvaluator. Handles evaluation of domain specifications (criteria only) against EF Core IQueryable. Includes, sorting, and pagination are handled at the repository level.

member.name: M:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.EfCoreSpecificationEvaluator`1.Evaluate(System.Linq.IQueryable{`0},AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.ISpecification{`0},AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.SpecificationEvaluationOptions)
member.summary: Applies a specification to an IQueryable and returns the transformed query. Only applies criteria - no includes, sorting, or pagination.
Applies a specification optimized for counting (same as Evaluate since we only have criteria).

member.name: M:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.EfCoreSpecificationEvaluator`1.Any(System.Linq.IQueryable{`0},AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.ISpecification{`0},AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.SpecificationEvaluationOptions)
member.summary: Checks if any items match the specification criteria.

member.name: M:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.EfCoreSpecificationEvaluator`1.Count(System.Linq.IQueryable{`0},AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.ISpecification{`0},AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.SpecificationEvaluationOptions)
member.summary: Counts items matching the specification criteria.

member.name: M:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.EfCoreSpecificationEvaluator`1.ConvertDecimalToDoubleIfNeeded(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Object}})
member.summary: Converts decimal expressions to double for SQLite compatibility. SQLite does not support ordering by decimal directly, so we convert to double. This method is public so it can be used by repository implementations that apply ordering directly.

member.name: T:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.InfrastructureInitialization
member.summary: Infrastructure initialization for registering handlers with Domain layer. This should be called during application startup to register Infrastructure implementations.

member.name: M:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.EntityFrameworkCore.Specifications.InfrastructureInitialization.RegisterHandlers
member.summary: Registers all Infrastructure handlers with Domain layer. Call this during application startup (e.g., in Program.cs or Startup.cs).
